## Backend/Service generated by Mayson.dev

### Local setup (with uv)

Install [uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/) then:

```bash
uv pip install -r requirements.txt
```

### Build Docker image

```bash
docker build -t my-app .
```

### Run it on port 3000

```bash
docker run -p 3000:3000 my-app
```

---
